required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of NMN on Muscle Recovery and Physical Capacity in Healthy Volunteers With Moderate Physical Activity
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial of Nicotinamide Mononucleotide on Muscle Recovery and Physical Capacity in Healthy Volunteers With Moderate Physical Activity

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of NMN supplementation (250 and 500 mg/day over 38 days) compared to placebo in healthy volunteers with moderate physical activity on muscle recovery, physical capacity, cardiorespiratory recovery, the perception of the arduousness of the effort, the variation in blood lactate levels before and after physical exercise, the perception of the intensity of post-exercise muscle pain (cramps), the body composition and Nicotinamide-Adenine Mononucleotide (NAD+) level in blood.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Randomized double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial conducted on 3 parallel groups
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
primary_outcome.description: Wingate Anaerobic Test (WANT) preformed post-endurance test (at 85% maximum aerobic speed)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: physical capacity evaluated during an endurance test (at 85% maximum aerobic speed) by the maximum duration (time limit)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of blood pressure and heart rate at rest and at intervals of several minutes after the endurance test (at 85% maximum aerobic speed)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the perception of the arduousness of the effort
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: evaluated by the Borg scale during the endurance test (at 85% maximum aerobic speed)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in blood lactate levels before and after physical exercise
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: blood lactate levels before and after the endurance test (at 85% maximum aerobic speed)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the perception of the intensity of post-exercise muscle pain (cramps)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: post-exercise muscular pain in evaluated using a 7 points numerical scale, 24, 48 and 72 hours after the endurance test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: fat mass, muscle mass, visceral fat, water mass determined by Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis (BIA)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: before and after 21 and 38 days of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of cellular NAD+ concentration in blood from baseline to the end of study

intervention.description: Daily supplementation with NMN at 250 and 500 mg for 38 days in total
Daily supplementation with placebo for 38 days in total
